body_html:
ok i see the problem. LAPACK is being linked against generic, not openblas or mkl, and your generic system-provided lapack prob has this issue.

I'd suggest a simple fix:

export CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH=[your anaconda path]

for example

export CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH=~/anaconda2

and then

conda install mkl

and the build pytorch from source as usual.

I've added these notes now to README ( https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch#from-source )

body:
ok i see the problem. LAPACK is being linked against generic, not openblas or mkl, and your generic system-provided lapack prob has this issue.

I'd suggest a simple fix:

```
export CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH=[your anaconda path]
```

for example

```
export CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH=~/anaconda2
```

and then

``` bash
conda install mkl
```

and the build pytorch from source as usual.

I've added these notes now to README ( https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch#from-source )
